import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import React from 'react' import "./searchItem.css" const SearchItem = ({item}) => { return (
{ e.target.onerror = null; e.target.src="https://img.freepik.com/free-photo/type-entertainment-complex-popular-resort-with-pools-water-parks-turkey-with-more-than-5-million-visitors-year-amara-dolce-vita-luxury-hotel-resort-tekirova-kemer_146671-18728.jpg?t=st=1721189293~exp=1721192893~hmac=524ad45311d46e57f674e0925ed3032c75dd4d6a7380381a045192aae06e7509&w=996"; }} className='siImg'/>

{item.name}

{item.distance}m from center Free airport taxi Studio Apartment with Air conditioning {item.desc} Free cancellation You can cancel later, so lock in this great price today!
{item.rating &&
Excellent
}
${item.cheapestPrice} Includes taxes and fees
) } export default SearchItem
